[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”hero” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,0,0,0.69)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0.83)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://socialistics.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/jonathan-velasquez-c1ZN57GfDB0-unsplash-scaled.jpg” min_height=”500px” height=”500px” custom_padding=”150px||100px||false|false” locked=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#0582ca” divider_style=”dotted” divider_weight=”8px” _builder_version=”4.6.1″ _module_preset=”default” width=”9%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||5px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”40px” header_2_font=”Montserrat|300||on|||||” header_2_text_align=”left” header_2_text_color=”#ffffff” header_2_font_size=”40px” hover_enabled=”0″ header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”28px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_2_font_size_phone=”28px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Podcast Guest Questionnaire

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”team” _builder_version=”4.6.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”100px||100px||true|false” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” custom_css_after_last_edited=”off|phone” custom_css_after_tablet=”content: ”;||background: url(‘https://socialistics.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/Triangle-Down-img.png’);||position: absolute;||height:150px;||width: 260px;||bottom: -50px;||background-repeat: no-repeat;||left: 250px;||background-size: cover;||z-index: 2;” custom_css_after_phone=”content: ”;||background: url(‘https://socialistics.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/Triangle-Down-img.png’);||position: absolute;||height:150px;||width: 260px;||bottom: -50px;||background-repeat: no-repeat;||left: 100px;||background-size: cover;||z-index: 2;” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text disabled_on=”off|off|off” admin_label=”Heading” module_class=”team-block” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Karla||||||||” text_text_color=”#747474″ text_font_size=”16px” link_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” link_text_color=”#0582ca” header_2_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_3_font=”Montserrat|||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#0582ca” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”-13px|||||” hover_enabled=”0″ text_font_size_tablet=”14px” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” link_font_size_tablet=”12px” link_font_size_phone=”” link_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”28px” header_2_font_size_phone=”26px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_3_font_size_tablet=”20px” header_3_font_size_phone=”18px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Thank you for your interest in being on the Socialistics podcast. Please review our requirements below, and if you agree to them, fill out the following form to be considered for the show.

By participating in the Socialistics Podcast interview with Jason Yormark, you agree to the following:

General

  • You agree to participate as an expert in one 20-30 minute interview on the subject area we discussed.
  • The interview will be recorded by Jason Yormark.
  • Jason Yormark will provide the interview call line, recording, and email reminders.

Intellectual Property

  • Socialistics owns the recording and may re-purpose, resell, distribute and disseminate the recording in the future, without compensation to you.
  • You agree to allow Socialistics to retain rights to the produced media for potential future use in speeches, books, and in all other public distribution.

Marketing Commitment

  • You agree to send your entire community one email and 2 social media posts for the podcast episode.
  • Sample post copy and share images/assets will be provided.
  • You agree to leave a rating/review on Apple Podcasts prior to recording the show.

If for some reason you’re unable to make the above marketing commitments, you agree to contact Jason Yormark at Socialistics to make an alternate arrangement.

If you do not have the requested information, no problem, just enter “n/a” or leave it blank. The information you provide is for our use only, we promise not to share. Your privacy is important, and we have a zero-tolerance, no SPAM policy.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

  • Max. file size: 50 MB.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
